channel.title: Pages on Edwin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Edwin's Blog

item.title: Site Notice
item.description: Code for this site can be found on GitHub. Blog generated with Hugo. This blog’s theme is a derivation of the popular Natrium theme.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Edwin Kofler, an in progress full-stack and DevOps engineer. See my GitHub profile to see what I’ve been working on. You can learn more about me at kofler.dev.
